text: Peter Breakwell (born 25 October 1957) is a New Zealand equestrian. He competed in the individual jumping event at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of New Zealand Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:People from Waipukurau
title: Peter Breakwell
